title: properties.id.description
Section: A globally unique identifier of a section maximum to be used in all external references.

title: properties.title.description
Section: The full name of a section.

title: properties.startOn.description
Section: The starting date at which a Section may be scheduled to be taken.

title: properties.endOn.description
Section: The ending date at which a Section may no longer be scheduled to be taken.

title: properties.code.description
Section: The human-readable identifier of a Section. It is generally unique within an academic period.

title: properties.number.description
Section: A numbering scheme or other mark that distinguishes between multiple sections.  It is generally unique within an academic period and course.

title: properties.instructionalPlatform.description
Section: The technology platform used to manage the administration of a section

Section: The code that identifies a Technology Platform.

title: properties.instructionalPlatform.oneOf.properties.title.description

Section: The instructional platform used in this section.

title: properties.instructionalPlatform.oneOf.properties.detail.properties.id.description
Section: The global identifier for Instructional Platform

title: properties.course.description
Section: The course associated with this section.

Section: The full name of a course.

title: properties.course.properties.subject.description
Section: A branch of knowledge typically used as a course of study

title: properties.course.properties.subject.properties.abbreviation.description

title: properties.course.properties.subject.properties.title.description

title: properties.course.properties.subject.properties.detail.description

title: properties.course.properties.number.description
Section: A numbering scheme to distinguish different Courses. Typically this is an integer

title: properties.course.properties.detail.description
Section: The course associated with this section.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.creditCategory.properties.code.description
Section: The code that identifies a credit category.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.creditCategory.properties.title.description
Section: The full name of a credit category.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.creditCategory.properties.creditType.description
Section: The higher-level category of academic credits.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.creditCategory.properties.detail.description

title: properties.credits.items.properties.creditCategory.properties.detail.properties.id.description

title: properties.credits.items.properties.measure.description
Section: A unit or standard of measurement.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.minimum.description
column3: inclusive bound of a numeric range of values.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.maximum.description
column3: inclusive bound of a numeric range of values.

title: properties.credits.items.properties.increment.description
Section: The multiple by which a numeric range of values can be stepped from the minimum to the maximum. For example
column3: a range of 1 to 3 with an increment of 1 would evaluate to 1
column5: or 3. Specifying an increment of 0.5 would evaluate to 1

title: properties.site.description

title: properties.site.oneOf.properties.title.description
Section: The full name of the site.

title: properties.site.oneOf.properties.detail.description
Section: The site where this section's events will be held.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.timePeriod.description
Section: The period of time to be repeated.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.timePeriod.properties.startOn.description
Section: The beginning of the time period being repeated.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.timePeriod.properties.endOn.description
Section: The end of the time period being repeated.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.description
Section: The rule that describes how to repeat the time period.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Section: Rules for repeating on a daily basis.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Section: Number of days between each repetition.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Section: When to end the daily repetitions.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Section: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Section: Rules for repeating on a weekly basis.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Section: Number of weeks between each repetition.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.daysOfWeek.description
Section: The days of the week on which to repeat the event.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Section: When to end the weekly repetitions.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Section: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Section: Rules for repeating on a monthly basis.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Section: Number of months between each repetition.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.description
Section: How to calculate the day of the month on which to start repeating.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.oneOf.properties.dayOfMonth.description
Section: The number of the day in the month on which to start repeating.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.oneOf.properties.dayOfWeek.description
Section: The cardinal day of the week (e.g.
column5: etc.) in the month on which to start repeating.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.oneOf.properties.dayOfWeek.properties.occurrence.description
Section: The nth occurrence of the day of the week in the month. Use a positive number to count from the start of the month (e.g.
column5: and a negative number to count from the end of the month (e.g. -1 = last in the month

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Section: When to end the monthly repetitions.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Section: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Section: Rules for repeating on an annual basis.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Section: Number of years between each repetition.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Section: When to end the yearly repetitions.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Section: The date after which to stop repeating.

Section: The full name of a room.

Section: A numbering scheme to distinguish different buildings
column4: and rooms located in the same site.  Typically this is a string.

Section: The name of the floor where a room is located.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.building.description
column4: which is located at a specified physical location.

Section: The full name of a building.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.building.properties.code.description
Section: A code that identifies the building.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.building.properties.detail.description
Section: The building used in this instructional event.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.detail.description
Section: The room where the event will take place.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.description
Section: A meeting location available via a computer network
column3: such as an online video conference.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.phoneNumber.description
Section: The international telephone number of the location.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.phoneExtension.description
Section: The telephone extension number of the location's telephone.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.webAddress.description
Section: The primary web address (URL) of the online meeting location.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.description
Section: A human readable description of a location.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.description
Section: A person assigned to teach an instruction method of a section.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.properties.names.description
Section: The parts of a particular form of a person's name.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.properties.names.items.properties.type.description
Section: A type of name being defined. For example

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.properties.names.items.properties.lastNamePrefix.description
Section: The article or preposition portion of a person's last name. For example

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.properties.credentials.description
Section: The unique information that identifies a user to a system such as a network or computer.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.properties.credentials.items.properties.value.description
Section: The credential used in this section.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.workLoadPercentage.description
Section: The rate or proportion per hundred of the instructional method's work load that is attributable to the instructor.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.responsibilityPercentage.description
Section: The rate or proportion per hundred of the responsibility for managing the instructional method's activities that is attributable to the instructor.

title: properties.instructionalEvents.items.properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.workStartOn.description

Section: The date after which an instructor is no longer assigned to the scheduled event for a Section.

Section: The instructional event associated to this section.
